entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
